stories.text:
Not using the “posted last week” filter.

The longer a job is posted, the more likely it is to have been filled or have a lot of candidates in the pipeline.

Hope this helps!

Using the "posted in the last week" filter decreases the chances that you're spending time on roles that aren't worth your time.
stories.title: One mistake could lead to several more months on the job search
Operation Tulip: Facebook’s Secretive Push to Build Holland’s Biggest Datacenter

stories.text:
On 1/31 Docker Desktop will no longer be free to use on MacOS, and if you have it installed on your work laptop you may be in violation of their license terms.

While I don't condone a business for wanting to make money, I would personally prefer a FOSS alternative rather than have to sign up for another monthly subscription.

Are there any alternatives to Docker Desktop and Docker Compose that people have had luck with? Drop-in compatibility would be great, but I'm willing to make changes as well.
stories.title: Ask HN: Best Docker Desktop Replacement for macOS?
